resources.string: Node.jsÂ® is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome\'s V8 JavaScript engine.
npm is a package manager for the JavaScript programming language maintained by npm, Inc.
React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
Vue.js is a progressive framework for building user interfaces.
Next. js is a React framework for developing single page Javascript applications
Laravel is primarily used for building custom web apps using PHP.
